author: rcm
msg: Fixed a bug in Title that occured when a TitledObject returned a null.  Now nulls from the TitleObject are treated as empty stings.

author: rcm
msg: Added checking of the commands added to a transaction to ignore unneeded save, creates etc.

author: rcm
msg: Added better logging and shutdown method to components to try and get memory released.

author: rcm
msg: Moved the resposibility for getting Configuration from ConfigurationFactory to NakedObjects
